item.atum.villager_spawn_egg: Ovo gerador de aldeão do Áthum
chat.atum.enemies: There are too many enemies nearby to search this chest
chat.atum.cannot_spawn_pharaoh: The pharaoh turns over in their sarcophagus
chat.atum.spinning_wheel_recipe_in_progr: The Spinning Wheel already contains an input (%s)
item.atum.idol_of_labor.4: This just turned into super advanced #*@&.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.7: Well I had to come up with something!
item.atum.idol_of_labor.11: Oh #*@&, I have to do a #*@& ton of fancy stuff for this. Oh well.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.12: Maybe its on one of your secret spreadsheets..
item.atum.idol_of_labor.13: Sure, if you want your world to die.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.14: There is stuff for you to do in the sheet!
item.atum.idol_of_labor.17: Need to get up early, well "early".
item.atum.idol_of_labor.21: Oh I get today off too?
item.atum.idol_of_labor.22: I'M NOT LIVING YOUR DAY THOUGH!
item.atum.idol_of_labor.26: I meant good that you weren't changing it.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.29: I thought you said you wouldn't add anymore pickhammers?
item.atum.idol_of_labor.30: Its not like we're gonna add other javelins.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.44: Oh that's doing fancy stuff, woo!
item.atum.idol_of_labor.47: He told me to see if it would make you stop making me do silly stuff!
item.atum.idol_of_labor.48: Oh god, this turned into a lot of work.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.50: I broke everything. Now I'm trying to unbreak everything.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.51: Struggling with all sorts of issues atm, so fun times!
item.atum.idol_of_labor.54: Not sure how to do that with a block.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.56: I know exactly what's wrong btw.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.57: Pretty sure it will be broken for all then.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.58: Oh good. So I didn't break that today, broke it yesterday. Good to know.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.61: Please don't push anything that is not textures atm, I don't want all my #*@& to break.
item.atum.idol_of_labor.65: RELEASE DATE TOMORROW, GO FIX ALL THE THINGS GIRAFI!
advancement.atum.deserthunter.desc: Kill one of each type of Atum animal

advancement.atum.lawbringer.desc: Kill one of each type of Atum bandit

atum.tip.title: Atum Tip
atum.tip.stoneguards_stonewardens: You can create Stoneguards & Stonewardens yourself, to help defend your base!
atum.tip.scarabs: Scarabs can sometimes be found in Deadwood Logs
atum.tip.wanderer_helmet: A Wanderer Helmet will improve your visibility
atum.tip.curator: You can trade Relics with a Curator villager
